Initially, the vehicle is stationary or moving very slowly as it waits for the gate to open. Several pedestrians are observed crossing the vehicle's path in front of the gate. As the barrier gate begins to rise and eventually fully opens, the vehicle starts to move forward through the archway. Upon clearing the immediate gate area and entering a more open intersection or complex road layout, a black sedan is visible on the right side, seemingly parked or waiting. A large green and white bus is seen moving from the left side of the frame towards the right, crossing the intersection. Critically, a person on a scooter/motorcycle suddenly emerges from behind this moving bus on the right side, directly entering the vehicle's intended path with very little warning, creating an immediate and significant collision risk.
